content.question: What was the primary intention of the Adams administration in enforcing the Sedition Act?

choices.label: To stop illegal aliens from voting
To intimidate critics of Adams’ foreign policy toward France and England
To prosecute Democratic-Republicans who violated American neutrality
To prepare for war against Great Britain
To keep France from selling Louisiana to Spain

content.answer: To intimidate critics of Adams’ foreign policy toward France and England

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
